question: Display novels and poems written in Italian.
sql_query1:
SELECT Novels.title as title
FROM Novels
WHERE Novels.language = "Italian"
UNION
SELECT Poems.poem_name as title
FROM Poems
WHERE Poems.language = "Italian"
sql_query2:
SELECT Novels.title as title
FROM Novels
UNION
SELECT Poems.poem_name as title
FROM Poems
WHERE Poems.language = "Italian"
interpretation1: Can you show novels and poems written in Italian?
interpretation2: List all novels and also display poems written in Italian.
